ValidationRule.description: GTMS-16419: Created as part of 3PF phase 2 project to restrict user from editing the FPQ record if opportunity stage > 90%
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Opportunity__r.Probability > 0.90, OR( ISPICKVAL(Financing_Decision__c, 'Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Financing_Decision__c, 'Declined'), ISPICKVAL(Financing_Decision__c, 'Need More Info'), ISPICKVAL(Financing_Decision__c, 'Resubmit For Review'), ISPICKVAL(Financing_Decision__c, 'Pending - Under Partner Review'), ISPICKVAL(Financing_Decision__c, 'Pending') ), CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e1a000000dxEqAAI',/*System Admin API*/ CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e1a000000UoNcAAK'/*System Admin*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot make changes on this record as the related opportunity stage > 90%
